### 문서 도구 개발 역사

```{r}
#| eval: false
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
library(gt)
library(gtExtras)

history_html <- read_html('https://jjallaire.quarto.pub/notebook-publishing/#/history') 

history_url <- history_html |> 
  html_element('table') |> 
  html_elements('a') |> 
  html_attr("href")

history_tbl <- history_html |> 
  html_element('table') |> 
  html_table() |> 
  set_names(c("연도", "도구", "개발자"))  |> 
  mutate(url = history_url) |> 
  mutate(link = str_glue("<a href={url}>{도구}</a>")) |> 
  select(연도, link, 개발자) |> 
  add_row(연도 = 2020, link = "<a href=https://quarto.org>Quarto</a>",
          개발자 = "J.J. Allaire")

# history_tbl |> 
#   write_csv("data/history_tbl.csv")
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
library(gt)
library(gtExtras)

history_tbl <- 
  read_csv("data/history_tbl.csv")

history_tbl |> 
  mutate(link = map(link, gt::html)) |> 
  select(연도, 도구=link, 개발자) |> 
  gt() |> 
    gt_theme_hangul() |> 
    cols_align("center")
```
:::
